name: MEKTOVI

indications.text: mektovi kinase inhibitor indicated : • combination encorafenib , treatment patients unresectable metastatic melanoma braf v600e v600k mutation , detected fda-approved test . ( 1.1 , 2.1 ) • combination encorafenib , treatment adult patients metastatic non-small cell lung cancer ( nsclc ) braf v600e mutation , detected fda-approved test . ( 1.2 , 2.1 )

contraindications.text: melanoma • confirm presence braf v600e v600k mutation tumor specimens prior initiation mektovi . ( 2.1 ) • recommended dose 45 mg orally twice daily combination encorafenib . take mektovi without food . ( 2.2 ) • patients moderate severe hepatic impairment recommended dose 30 mg orally twice daily . ( 2.4 , 8.6 ) nsclc • confirm presence braf v600e mutation tumor plasma specimens prior initiating mektovi . ( 2.1 ) • recommended dose 45 mg orally twice daily combination encorafenib . take mektovi without food . ( 2.2 )

warningsAndPrecautions: mektovi ( binimetinib ) supplied 15 mg yellow/dark yellow , unscored biconvex oval film-coated tablets debossed stylized `` `` one side `` 15 `` side , available bottles 180 tablets ( ndc 70255-010-02 ) .
indications_original: MEKTOVI is a kinase inhibitor indicated: • in combination with encorafenib, for the treatment of patients with unresectable or metastatic melanoma with a BRAF V600E or V600K mutation, as detected by an FDA-approved test. ( 1.1 , 2.1 ) • in combination with encorafenib, for the treatment of adult patients with metastatic non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) with a BRAF V600E mutation, as detected by an FDA-approved test. ( 1.2 , 2.1 )
contraindications_original: Melanoma • Confirm the presence of BRAF V600E or V600K mutation in tumor specimens prior to the initiation of MEKTOVI. ( 2.1 ) • The recommended dose is 45 mg orally twice daily in combination with encorafenib. Take MEKTOVI with or without food. ( 2.2 ) • For patients with moderate or severe hepatic impairment the recommended dose is 30 mg orally twice daily. ( 2.4 , 8.6 ) NSCLC • Confirm the presence of BRAF V600E mutation in tumor or plasma specimens prior to initiating MEKTOVI. ( 2.1 ) • The recommended dose is 45 mg orally twice daily in combination with encorafenib. Take MEKTOVI with or without food. ( 2.2 )
warningsAndPrecautions_original: MEKTOVI (binimetinib) is supplied as 15 mg yellow/dark yellow, unscored biconvex oval film-coated tablets debossed with a stylized "A" on one side and "15" on the other side, available in bottles of 180 tablets (NDC 70255-010-02).
